attributes.background: Stop all smoking of cigarettes out side of northeast schools.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this is something that would be the responsibility of schools and local authorities in the North East and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more on the law on smoking in public places here:

http://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/SN04414/SN04414.pdf

You could sign this petition to ban smoking outside designated areas if that is something you would like to see happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226928
